core_meaning.normalized_summary: Gathering and unification. People assemble around a legitimate center — ritual, shared purpose, trusted leadership. That unity is powerful and can move outward in any direction. But it only holds if it’s sincere, ethically guided, and not faked for advantage. True assembly requires devotion, offering, and steadiness; without that, the group scatters into confusion or resentment.

lines.normalized_meaning: Your wish to unite is real, but blocked, which creates chaos and mixed signals. Ask for support from the right ally; tension can flip quickly to joy. Don’t over-worry — moving ahead is still okay.

六二：引吉，無咎，孚乃利用禴。

lines.normalized_meaning: You are guided into alignment by someone you trust. Because the sincerity is complete, even a modest offering is welcomed. Shared devotion matters more than display.

lines.normalized_meaning: You ache for connection and feel shut out. It’s discouraging. Keep moving toward honest union anyway — you won’t be wrong, even if it’s imperfect and a bit humiliating.

lines.normalized_meaning: You’re in a strong, exposed position near power. If things go very well, you’re praised; if they slip, you take the heat. High stakes, high reward.
